MATTERMOST_VERSION.description: Mattermost version to install, semver format

FILE_SETTINGS__DRIVER_NAME.description: The type of file storage to use. Must be local or amazons3. WARNING: If local, files will be periodically wiped when the dyno restarts. Only use local for temporary preview instances.

FILE_SETTINGS__AMAZON_S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The access key for your Amazon S3. Only required for driver name amazons3.

FILE_SETTINGS__AMAZON_S3_SECRET_ACCESS_K.description: The secret access key for your Amazon S3. Only required for driver name amazons3.

FILE_SETTINGS__AMAZON_S3_BUCKET.description: The name you selected for your S3 bucket in AWS. Only required for driver name amazons3.

FILE_SETTINGS__AMAZON_S3_REGION.description: The AWS region you selected when creating your S3 bucket. Refer to AWS Reference Documentation (http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/rande.html#s3_region) and choose this variable from the Region column.
